text: Joe Reuben Madden (ne Combs; born March 11, 1979) is an American singer best known as the lead vocalist for the pop punk band Good Charlotte. == Early life == Madden was born in Waldorf, Maryland to Robin Madden and Roger Combs. He has a twin brother Benji Madden who plays guitar and sings backing vocals in their band, Good Charlotte. == References == Category:1979 births Category:American Christians Category:American rock singers Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Living people
title: Joel Madden
